mapper.select: SELECT e.EMP_ID AS emp_id, e.NAME AS name, e.DEPT_CODE AS dept_code, d.DEPT_NAME AS dept_name, e.POSITION AS position, e.TITLE AS title, e.BIRTH AS birth, e.PHONE AS phone, e.EMAIL AS email, e.JOIN_DATE AS joinDate, e.LEAVE_DATE AS leaveDate, e.LEAVE_REASON AS leaveReason, e.BANK_CODE AS bankCode, e.ACCOUNT_NO AS accountNo, e.ZIP_CODE AS zipCode, e.ADDRESS AS address, e.ADDRESS_DETAIL AS addressDetail, e.ACCOUNT_NAME AS accountName, e.COMPANY_CODE AS companyCode FROM EMP e LEFT JOIN DEPT d ON e.DEPT_CODE = d.DEPT_CODE WHERE e.COMPANY_CODE = #{companyCode} ORDER BY e.EMP_ID DESC
